#summary How to install MSYS shell environment for Windows

= Introduction =

MSYS is a collection of GNU utilities to build applications and programs which depend on UNIX. Before the installation of MSYS, [InstallingMinGWForWindows MinGW] must be intalled in _C:\sde\MinGW_.

= Details = 

Download the latest stable version of the MSYS installer (version MSYS-1.0.11). To do it, click on the following [hhttp://sourceforge.net/projects/mingw/files/MSYS%20Base%20System/ link] to go to the MSYS Base System section of the MinGW website.

Once you are there, expand the Current Release_MSYS-1.0.11 section of the page, and clik on the link to the executable file: 'MSYS-1.0.11.exe' as shown in Figure 1.

||http://lh5.ggpht.com/_tmEVMS15i5Y/Snid5ss27LI/AAAAAAAAATA/X3tDvPWItbQ/s800/MSYS_installation01.jpg||
|| *Figure 1. Link to download the MSYS installer as located in the MSYS Base System section of the MinGW website in !SourceForge.*||

 # Create a msys directory folder in _C:\msys\usr_.
 # Extract downloaded files in the created folder.
 # Run _pi.bat_ in postinstall directory. A console window will be opened.
  * Press _y_ to continue with the intallation.
  * Press _y_ to indicate that MinGW is intalled.
  * The MinGW intallation directory is _c:/MinGW_.
  * Press a key to finish with the intallation.
